Desc.entry: Umbrella organisation supporting youth clubs and groups in Sheffield and South Yorkshire whose priority is voluntary groups for young people aged 12-18 years. Activities include training, events (art activities), advice and information. Can offer specialist help to groups on community arts, health and women's issues. Offers training in ASDAN (IT, Communication Skills etc), Introduction and Levels 2 & 3 to Youth Work Course and Introduction to Youth Arts. A registered charity.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLES GROUPS - RESOURCES AND SUPPORT SERVICES
